alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 8:17PM CDT until September 26 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... East central Warren County in east central Missouri... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Innsbrook, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... O`Fallon, Wentzville, Lake St. Louis, Dardenne Prairie, Warrenton, Wright City, St. Paul, Truesdale, Innsbrook, New Melle, Josephville, Flint Hill, and Foristell. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 193 and 216. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
